enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Neroni Slade (Samoa), Co-Chair of the Joint Working Group on compliance (JWG), reported that informal consultations had provided an opportunity for delegates to examine the consequences of non-compliance, as well as the approaches for the adoption of the compliance procedures and mechanisms.
He said a revised text had been prepared that would serve as a basis for the negotiations.
